translations: n.[内科] 脑电图，[内科] 脑动电流图

phrs.translation: 脑电图, 脑电信号, 脑电, 信号
脑电流描记术, 脑电图
脑电图, 脑电波, 脑电信号
视频脑电图, 床旁视频脑电图

sentences.sentence: Method:Recorded changes on sleep electroencephalogram of sleep deprived children.
sentences.translation: 方法：记录被剥夺睡眠的睡眠脑电图变化。

sentences.sentence: The team also measured brain activity while subjects napped using an electroencephalogram.
sentences.translation: 该研究小组还用脑电图测量了参与者午睡中的大脑活动。

sentences.sentence: Aim: To explore the value of compressed spectral array (CSA) in analyzing routine electroencephalogram (EEG).
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨压缩谱阵(CSA)分析常规脑电图的临床价值。
